mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(EXTRACT (YEAR FROM SYSDATE))||'-'||'AR'||'-'||(select lpad(nvl(to_number(substr(max_ea_no,9,3)),0)+1,3,0) from ( SELECT max(ea_no) max_ea_no FROM ELEC_APPROVAL where ea_no like '%'||#{form_code}||'%' )) FROM DUAL
SELECT LEFT_COUNT FROM EMPLOYEE_HOLIDAY WHERE BIRTH_YEAR = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) AND EMP_NO = #{emp_no}

SELECT EAP.*,FORM.FORM_TITLE,AF.* FROM ELEC_APPROVAL EAP JOIN EA_FORM FORM ON EAP.FORM_CODE = FORM.FORM_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN APPROVAL_FILE AF ON EAP.EA_NO = AF.DOC_NO WHERE DRAFTER_ID = #{emp_no} ORDER BY DRAFT_DATE DESC

SELECT info.*,e.emp_name drafter_name, hh.left_count left_count FROM view_elec_appr_infos info join employee e on drafter_id = emp_no join holiday_history hh on info.ea_no = hh.ea_no WHERE RESULT_CODE = 0 AND DRAFTER_ID = #{emp_no} OR (RESULT_CODE = 2 AND ( (SECOND_APPROVER = #{emp_no} ) OR (THIRD_APPROVER = #{emp_no}) OR (FINAL_APPROVER = #{emp_no}) )) ORDER BY DRAFT_DATE DESC
